product.name: jordan
product.about: Air Jordan is a line of basketball and sportswear shoes produced by Nike, Inc. The shoes, related apparel and accessories are now marketed under Jordan Brand. The first Air Jordan shoe was produced for basketball player Michael Jordan during his time with the Chicago Bulls on November 17, 1984

product.name: Nike
product.about: Nike, Inc.[note 1] (stylized as NIKE) is an American athletic footwear and apparel corporation headquartered near Beaverton, Oregon.[6] It is the world's largest supplier of athletic shoes and apparel and a major manufacturer of sports equipment, with revenue in excess of US$46 billion in its fiscal year 2022.[7][8]

product.name: uniqlo
product.about: Uniqlo is a worldwide popular and across-the-board t-shirt brand that is famous for its top-tier fabrics, minimalist designs, and most importantly, affordable prices.
